Micah Lasher received the greatest number of donations at or

over $1,000 in the race for Assembly District 69

Micah Lasher and Jordan Wright, the respective winners of New York State Assembly

District 69 and 70 primary races, received most of their donations from individuals.

Political committees and PACS

Partnerships, including LLPs

Candidate, candidate family member, or candidate spouse

Labor unions

Other individual donors

Other donors

District 69

Micah Lasher

Total value of donations: $470,389.50

1 square = 1 unique donor who donated at or over $1,000

Micah Lasher’s largest

donation was $5,000.

Eli Northrup

Total value of donations: $182,620.20

Eli Northrup’s largest

donation was $4,500.

District 70

Jordan Wright

Maria Ordoñez

Total value of donations: $248,217.30

Total value of donations: $80,571.06

Maria Ordoñez’s

largest donation

was $3,591.90.

Jordan Wright’s largest

donation was $4,000.

Note: “Other donors” refers to donors who did not indicate they were part of any of the

other categories.

Source: New York State Board of Elections

Graphic by Alison Chiu
